name: Kim Lien Mini Market
description: We are a family-run pan-Asian grocery store located in Peckham. We stock everything from cooking noodles, sauces, instant noodles and snacks. Our eBay shop is open 24/7 and usually dispatched within two working days with Hermes, stocking dry goods.
safetyTips: Hermes contact-free delivery for eBay orders. Our physical store is only allowing 2 customers at a time in-store and we are practising social distancing.
